mapper.select: select sale_id, sale_sn, customer_id, seckill_id, sale_status, sale_time, sale_amount, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, delete_flag from seckill_sale where sale_id = #{saleId}
mapper.insert: insert into seckill_sale(sale_sn, customer_id, seckill_id, sale_status, sale_time, sale_amount, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, delete_flag) values (#{saleSn}, #{customerId}, #{seckillId}, #{saleStatus}, #{saleTime}, #{saleAmount}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{deleteFlag})

insert into seckill_sale(sale_sn, customer_id, seckill_id, sale_status, sale_time, sale_amount, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, delete_flag) values
(#{entity.saleSn}, #{entity.customerId}, #{entity.seckillId}, #{entity.saleStatus}, #{entity.saleTime}, #{entity.saleAmount}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.deleteFlag})

insert into seckill_sale(sale_sn, customer_id, seckill_id, sale_status, sale_time, sale_amount, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, delete_flag) values
(#{entity.saleSn}, #{entity.customerId}, #{entity.seckillId}, #{entity.saleStatus}, #{entity.saleTime}, #{entity.saleAmount}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.deleteFlag})
on duplicate key update sale_sn = values(sale_sn), customer_id = values(customer_id), seckill_id = values(seckill_id), sale_status = values(sale_status), sale_time = values(sale_time), sale_amount = values(sale_amount), create_by = values(create_by), create_time = values(create_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time), delete_flag = values(delete_flag)
